lead_paragraph: A millennial-led shift to digital financial services could upend the consumer banking industry.

headline.print_headline: A Financial Industry Scramble as More Pay by Smartphone
headline.main: As More Pay by Smartphone, Banks Scramble to Keep Up

snippet: A millennial-led shift to digital financial services could upend the consumer banking industry.
abstract: Growing use of digital financial services and mobile payment systems, particularly among millennials, has major consumer banks scrambling to modernize and adapt; venture capitalists are pouring money into so-called 'fintech' industry, and large tech companies like Apple, Google and Amazon have rolled out payment systems that are seen as potential precursors to more comprehensive services; shift presents regulatory concerns.
